GSD.description:
dm integrity: fix memory corruption when tag_size is less than digest size

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.4.190 by commit 7f84c937222944c03f4615ca4742df6bed0e5adf. For more details please see the references link.
